t.about.title: About
t.about.content.1: This project is an exercise in style. It is a copy exercise by the project {param} by Riccardo Palombo, whose content and project I admire.
t.about.content.2: In creating my own portfolio, I found the idea of trying to replicate, with different technologies more akin to my background, the project he proposed niteresting.
t.about.content.3:
In this exercise, I am also going to integrate some features such the possibility of changing fonts and UI theme.
I use {param} like icon asset.
 There isnt'ads, cookies or any other form of tracking.
